scripts.ready: pnpm fix && pnpm typecheck && pnpm test
scripts.ready:check: pnpm lint && pnpm typecheck && pnpm test
scripts.version:bump: pnpm -r exec npm version "$VERSION" --no-git-tag-version && npm version "$VERSION" --no-git-tag-version
scripts.version:bump:prerelease: pnpm -r exec npm version "pre$VERSION" --no-git-tag-version --preid "$PREID" && npm version "pre$VERSION" --no-git-tag-version --preid "$PREID"
